events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I would like to request a refund because it doesn't fit as expected and I want to return it.
The customer's request mentioning refund and return was categorized under the Refund cluster for appropriate handling.
Assigned customer support representative Emily to handle the refund request and initiate the return process.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I’m here to assist you with your refund request for the jacket purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in its original packaging for the return?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and yes, the jacket is unused and still in the original packaging as delivered.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated the return process. We will send you a prepaid shipping label to return the jacket, and once received, we will process your refund promptly.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions on how to return the jacket.
The return shipping label has been sent to your email. Once you ship the jacket back, we will issue a full refund to your original payment method.
Hello, we wanted to check in and confirm that you received the return label and to ask if you need any assistance with the return process.
Yes, I received the label and have already sent the jacket back. I’ll wait for your confirmation of the refund.
We have confirmed receipt of the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect on your account within 3-5 business days.
We appreciate your business. Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience.
Completed the survey with positive feedback, expressing satisfaction with the responsiveness and clarity during the refund process.
Closed the case after successful refund and positive customer feedback, marking the support cycle as completed.
